programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: An adventure of a millionaire playboy who steals a priceless work of art and then strikes up a fiery romance with the brilliant female insurance investigator who is on to his game.

programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: An adventure of a millionaire playboy who steals a priceless work of art and then strikes up a fiery romance with the brilliant female insurance investigator who is on to his game.

programme.title: Life After Beth, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Zach is devastated by the unexpected death of his girlfriend, Beth (Aubrey Plaza) until she miraculously comes back to life. However, the newly returned Beth isn’t quite how he remembered and before long, Zach’s whole world takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Man in the Moon, (1991, Romance)
programme.desc: The heartwarming coming-of-age film set in the 1950s stars Reese Witherspoon as a 14-year-old girl who gets her first difficult lesson in love.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: From the hilarious adventure by Oscar Wilde comes this tale of two dashing young bachelors and the outrageous deceptions they find themselves in over love, starring Reese Witherspoon, Colin Firth, and Rupert Everett.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Bernie, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician (Jack Black, "School of Rock") strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, who soon becomes controlling.

programme.title: The Station Agent, (2003, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A loner with a passion for trains inherits an empty train station in the middle of nowhere. He encounters unexpected neighbors and with absolutely nothing in common, they form a friendship none of them could foresee.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Good girl Mary (Jena Malone) can't believe it when she gets pregnant by her newly-gay boyfriend. She also can't believe the actions of her popular, relentlessly devout best friend, Hilary Faye (Mandy Moore).

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Rambling Rose, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A confused and over-sexed young woman is taken in by a respectable Southern family. She is warmly received but trouble begins when she cannot control her sexual desires.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Mrs. Winterbourne, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: This fast-paced comedy follows the story of eighteen-year-old Connie Doyle an expectant mother with no money and an uncertain future.

programme.title: Rambling Rose, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A confused and over-sexed young woman is taken in by a respectable Southern family. She is warmly received but trouble begins when she cannot control her sexual desires.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1978, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: This dazzling remake of the 1956 spine-tingler stars Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Jeff Goldblum, Leonard Nimoy and Veronica Cartwright in an eerie tale of possession by "alien pods."

programme.title: Blacula, (1972, Vampires)
programme.desc: The eternally cool William Marshall puts a fresh spin on the age-old legend of the vampire, condemned to wander the Earth with an insatiable lust for blood in "Blacula," often credited as the first African-American horror film.

programme.title: Scream, Blacula, Scream!, (1973, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Brought back to the world of the living by a voodoo ceremony Blacula (William Marshall) is loosed with insatiable bloodlust upon the population of a small community in the Louisiana back country. Pam Grier also stars in this scintillating sequel

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Supposed true story about the Lutzm family whose dream house turns into a nightmare. The unsuspecting new tenants of a house whose previous occupants had been murdered in their sleep.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: It’s in the Cards, Part 1
programme.desc: When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yuma’s friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation. Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma fails?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: It’s in the Cards, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: While on the way to School Spirit Day, Yuma realizes the Golden Key his father gave him is missing. As Astral and Yuma retrace his steps, Yuma shares the exciting story behind the Golden Key’s origins.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: When Yuma gets into a fight with Bronk, their friendship is soon put to the ultimate test when an evil Number Card takes control of Yuma.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Battle With the Bot
programme.desc: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief. Can Yuma put a stop to this thief’s thieving ways, or will Yuma’s newest friend trash his plan to stop him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yuma’s Golden Key by challenging him to a duel. Can Shark sink his teeth into Kite’s life points and save Yuma’s prized possession, or will Kite’s cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: With his Golden Key in Kite’s possession, Yuma must hunt down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see Astral again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, while Astral looks for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Frozen in Time
programme.desc: When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Let the Duels Begin
programme.desc: With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world… that is, until he realizes he never entered. Can Yuma figure out a way to join the Carnival, or will Yuma’s efforts fall short?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Team Performance
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind: victory.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Yuma rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Yuma broke Anna’s heart years ago, and now she’s back for revenge. If Yuma loses, he has to be Anna’s boyfriend forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: No Tomato
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest test to date when he challenges the tomato loving Tombo to a duel. Can Yuma overcome his hate for tomatoes and be victorious, or will his taste buds only be serving up defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Life Is a Carnival, Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma gets taken for a wild ride when Kari's friend steals an extremely lucky card from the local museum. Relying on pure skill, Yuma must figure out a way to beat the luckiest guy in the world.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Life Is a Carnival, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s duel atop an out-of-control monorail takes a turn for the worse when his opponent plays a Number Card that guarantees a win every time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Foolish Fans
programme.desc: It's a dream come true for Caswell and Bronk when their favorite duelist in the world challenges them to a duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Shark Bait
programme.desc: Shark looks to sink his teeth into a duel with Quattro, but instead gets hooked into an underwater battle with Quattro’s sinister sibling.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Bad Developments, Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma hunts down a photographer whose pictures can predict the future. Unfortunately for Yuma and his friend Tori, it’s a future that’s not so bright.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Bad Developments, Part 2
programme.desc: Tori’s future is up in the air when the damaged airship she is on takes a turn for the worse - just as Yuma’s opponent Cameron predicted! Can Yuma save his best friend by winning his duel, or are the future photos Cameron snapped set in stone?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Double Jeopardy, Part 1
programme.desc: After accidentally falling asleep, Flip wakes up to a nightmare realization – he just slept through the first day of the World Duel Carnival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Double Jeopardy, Part 2
programme.desc: With Astral missing, Yuma must rely on his skills alone if he wants to defeat Nistro and Dextra and save his deck and spot in the World Duel Carnival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Pets Peeved
programme.desc: When Yuma's Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy calls on her feline friends to help hunt them down. After finding the hounds' hideout, Cathy is challenged by the pack leader to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: About Hart
programme.desc: After using his powers to escape from Heartland City, Hart unleashes a path of destruction that only Yuma can help stop!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Losing Hart
programme.desc: As Kite desperately searches for his brother, Vetrix puts his diabolical plan for revenge in motion.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Dubious Duo
programme.desc: Vetrix continues his quest to drain Hart of all his powers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Dragon Awakens
programme.desc: Kite must learn to work with Yuma if he wants to take down Trey and Quattro and rescue Hart. Can Kite put his pride aside and accept Yuma’s help, or will Kite’s ego end up sacrificing Hart’s safety?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Faced with tough decisions, Yuma decides to run away from his problems and search for his father until Master Roku confronts him, forcing him to face a few hard truths.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Ruffled Feathers
programme.desc: The race for entry into the World Duel Carnival sees Nistro clash with TV superhero The Sparrow.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Family Leave
programme.desc: Trey makes an unexpected visit to Yuma’s house and discovers the secret behind Yuma’s incredible dueling skills.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sky's the Limit
programme.desc: After accepting Trey’s challenge to a duel, Yuma soon learns that Trey has acquired a dark and dangerous new power.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Exit: Astral
programme.desc: With the bond between Astral and Yuma broken, Trey takes aim at the rest of Yuma’s life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Crestfallen
programme.desc: The back-and-forth battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climactic conclusion! Can Yuma defeat Trey without Astral’s assistance or will Trey triumph, leaving Yuma one Heart Piece short of making it to the finals?

programme.title: A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats’ missing money, but the Franky Family won’t give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Galley-la company! A grand sight: dock #1!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merry’s seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pirate abduction incident! A pirate ship that can only await her end!

programme.title: Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but they’ll need Luffy to even the odds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescuing our friend! Raid on the franky house!

programme.title: Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but he’s not at all happy to hear Luffy’s plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big fight under the moon! The pirate flag flutters with sorrow!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of two men's pride!

programme.title: The Straw Hat split is overshadowed by an assassination attempt on the mayor of Water Seven! Luffy is eager to investigate, but the leader of the Franky Family is about to reappear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Severe shock hits the city of water! Iceberg targeted!

programme.title: Luffy’s grudge match with Franky gets serious when his opponent turns out to be a cyborg! Iceberg awakes from his slumber only to hurl heinous accusations at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Iceberg’s strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.title: The citizens of Water Seven search for the Straw Hats and a devastating storm threatens to sink the city. Chopper and Sanji pick up Robin’s trail, but they aren’t prepared for what they’ll find.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: Usopp prepares to ride out the storm aboard the Going Merry, Franky hatches a plan to force Luffy into a rematch, and the Straw Hats set out to uncover Robin’s dark secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture robin! The determination of the straw hats!

programme.title: Robin and her CP9 brethren seek to settle unfinished business with Iceberg. The Straw Hats have a plan to clear their names, but the assassins are one step ahead of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire is the signal! Cp9 goes into action!

programme.title: Luffy makes his long-awaited entrance, Iceberg has a shocking surprise in store for Robin, and the true identities of the masked assassins of CP9 are finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cp9 takes off their masks! Their shocking true faces!

programme.title: CP9 listens to Iceberg’s blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats – plus a new friend – race to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but he’s never faced foes like this!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Come back, Robin! Showdown with cp9!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.title: Franky tries to convince Usopp that there’s no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper – inspired by a mysterious moment from the past – remains loyal to his beloved boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.title: A look back at Franky’s past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train – and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.title: Franky’s backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Tom’s life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.title: Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy – and a train!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.title: Chopper’s heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.title: Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The steam whistle forces friends apart! The sea train starts to run

programme.title: Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji barges in! Sea train battle in the storm!

programme.title: Chopper and Robin risk their own lives in a desperate attempt to save Luffy and Zoro from a monstrous wall of water! Meanwhile, Sanji moves ever closer to a reunion with Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's soul cries out! Straw hat luffy makes a comeback!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami ask to borrow a ship so they can chase down the sea train, but the weather is too severe to set sail. Lucky for them, Iceberg and his friends are full of surprises!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another sea train? Rocketman charges forth!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, Chopper, and Nami rocket toward a rendezvous with the assassins of CP 9, but they’ll need to forge an alliance with some new friends to have any chance at survival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescue our friends! A bond among foes sworn with fists!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy go head-to-head with Mother Nature, and Sanji’s rescue mission is bolstered by Franky’s allegiance – and the arrival of the mysterious Sniper King!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Smash the wave! Luffy and zoro use the strongest combo!

programme.title: Sniper King, a mysterious warrior from the island of snipers, lends a hand as Franky and Sanji try to fight their way to Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious man appears?! His name is sniper king!

programme.title: Sanji mixes it up with a deranged cook, Franky dukes it out with the newest member of CP9, and the Sniper King gets creative in his attempt to reach Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown between cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen kenpo!

programme.title: Franky and Sanji continue to battle the thugs of CP9. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the gang find themselves headed for a collision that could spell doom for everyone!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash! Demon-slasher zoro vs. Ship-slasher t-bone!

programme.title: The Sniper King hatches a daring escape plan, but the assassins of CP9 are more powerful than our heroes ever imagined. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang run into a very familiar frog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scramble over robin! A cunning plan by sniper king!

programme.title: As their train approaches Enies Lobby, Franky’s kind words cut through Robin’s cold exterior. Luffy’s train is thrown off course, but the group gains a powerful new ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The judicial island! Full view of enies lobby!

programme.title: The Straw Hats hatch a plan to rescue Robin, but as usual, Luffy can’t wait to find a fight. Will his impulsive attack derail their mission?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Landing operations start! Charge in, straw hats!

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Fort Defiance, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: A former Civil War solider bent on killing the man whose surrender got his brother killed, later finds out a rancher wants that same man and his blind brother killed.

programme.title: Fort Bowie, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Attempting to affect peace between his men and the Apaches, the commander of a fort unwittingly inspires an Indian massacre.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Valley Of Fire, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is the new mayor of a lawless town. He has to rid the town of its gambling king and to import a group of gals to settle the men. Gene must out-gun renegades who want to kidnap the gals.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill And The Indians, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Sydney White, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fiancé, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: A sassy, confident woman must use all her wiles to have any hope of bringing her man back...while keeping her pride intact.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia’s attack.
programme.sub-title: Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune's Last Stand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.
programme.sub-title: The Light of Hope: The Final Battle for the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon’s star seed, the Light of Hope reveals itself. The Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Love: The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon R: The Movie
programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the Sailor Guardians unite to save Earth from an alien force!

programme.title: Sailor Moon S: The Movie
programme.desc: Princess Snow Kaguya has a chilling plan to freeze Earth. Sailor Moon and her team are now the only hope!

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that she’s gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the school’s smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the general’s failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo’s friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mika’s feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that he’d like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moon’s identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: The Contractor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Security specialist Ray Breslin assembles an elite team to help him track down his trusted operative, Shu Ren, who has disappeared inside the most elaborate prison ever built.

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ray Breslin and his team of security experts fight to rescue Breslin's girlfriend and a tech mogul's daughter from a formidable prison known as Devil's Station.

programme.title: Criminal, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: The Contractor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Pandorum, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Two astronauts (Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster) discover a terrifying reality after awaking disoriented, aboard a seemingly abandoned spaceship.

programme.title: The Cell, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A special operations officer deals with multiple terrorist operations and hunts down terrorist cells.

programme.title: The Crazies, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A lawman (Timothy Olyphant) and his wife (Radha Mitchell) and two companions fight to make it out of town alive after an unknown toxin turns ordinary citizens into bloodthirsty lunatics.

programme.title: The Last Stand, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as a small border-town sheriff who makes a defiant stand to stop a fugitive on the run from the FBI.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: During an historic counter-terrorism summit in Spain, the President of the United States is struck down by an assassin's bullet. Eight strangers have a perfect view of the kill, but what did they really see? Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Catch 44, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Three friends (Akerman, Woll, Reed) sent by their boss to stop a drug deal get caught in a standoff with a psychopath (Whitaker), a truck driver, a line cook, and head crime boss (Willis).

programme.title: The Last Stand, (2016, Action)

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Ninja, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Scott Adkins – Tsuyoshi Ihara, Miki Hijii Diretor: Isaac Florentine

programme.title: O Guardião, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo México para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresário. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgatá-la e protegê-la. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa, (2001)
programme.desc: 2001. Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: John Travolta, Vince Vaughn, Teri Polo Diretor: Harold Becker

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991)
programme.desc: 1991. Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vítimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trás do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Dolph Lundgren, Louis Gossett Jr., Lisa Berkley, John Finn, Gil Kopel, Howard Rypp, Ofer Lehavi, Zadok Zarum, Oren Neeman, Sharon Hacohen Diretor: Manny Coto

programme.title: Centurião, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. O Império Romano controla do Egito à Espanha, do leste até o Mar Negro. Entretanto ele enfrenta problemas no norte da Grã-Bretanha, devido às táticas de guerrilha usadas por seus inimigos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Andreas Wisniewski, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Legeno, David Morrissey, Dhaffer L Abidine, Dominic West, Jj Feild, Lee Ross. Diretor: Neil Marshall

programme.title: Perigo na Montanha, (2018)
programme.desc: 2018. Joe Braven é um lenhador humilde que vive na fronteira dos Estados Unidos. Quando ele é assaltado por um grupo de traficantes de drogas na cabana isolada onde ele mora, ele fará tudo o que puder para proteger sua família. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Jason Momoa, Garret Dillahunt, Jill Wagner, Glenn Ennis, Todd Scott, Stephen Lang, Sasha Rossof, Sala Baker, Fraser Aitcheson, Teach Grant Diretor: Lin Oeding

programme.title: Guerra nas ruas, (1969)
programme.desc: 1969. O passado de Black Ops de Kane está causando incerteza no futuro da equipe SIU. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970)

programme.desc: 2017. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino. programme.title: O Mito, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William. programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991)
programme.desc: 1991. Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. programme.desc: 2020. Durante a Reforma, Klaas Voeten, um impressor de literatura proibida, é pego pela Inquisição por imprimir uma carta escrita por Martinho Lutero. Seu filho Falko é involuntariamente impelido a ajudar seu pai e a procurar a carta. Gêneros: Children & Family Elenco: Davy Gomez, Juna de Leeuw, Yorick van Wageningen | Diretor: Dennis Bots

programme.desc: 1993. Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo. programme.desc: 2022. A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu. programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Leonardo deve ir urgentemente ao escritório porque está sendo acusado de fraude; Irene e Leonardo devem lutar contra todos agora que estão casados. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Irene discute com Leo; Trinidad lê o jornal sobre o casamento de Irene e fica triste. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: As Origens do Universo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O mundo que nos rodeia contém muitos sistemas complexos que funcionam perfeitamente juntos. Durante muitos anos, houve um debate acalorado entre evolução e criação, com a questão central de tudo: a Terra foi criada ou surgiu por conta própria. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Rodrigo pede a María Lucía que revise alguns arquivos; María Lucía conversa com sua mãe sobre alguém que pode ajudá-las no caso de Virginia; Maribel descobre que foi Alejandra quem roubou as informações da empresa. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Trinidad visita Irene e pede que ela a ajude a descobrir quem quer prejudicá-los; Carlos Ernesto diz a Alejandra que ninguém precisa de sua ajuda, mas sabe que ela está tramando algo contra Irene. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alejandra tenta culpar Maribel pelo roubo das informações; Alejandra diz a Rodrigo que seus planos não saíram como deveriam; Felipe pergunta a Irene se ela é feliz. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Double Dragon, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Jimmy é acusado de uma série de crimes por um comissário de polícia corrupto e enviado para a prisão de Radica. Billy e Marian precisam libertar Jimmy antes que o Mestre das Sombras possa se livrar dele usando um mutante mortal chamado Hannibal. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Sugarcreek, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Pai e filho fugindo de uma tragédia chocante e brutal se instalam na cidade predominantemente amish de Sugarcreek, Ohio. Eles são acolhidos por três irmãs que oferecem ao pai um trabalho de faz-tudo, mas uma policial local começa a desconfiar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Escândalos no Tablóide, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O editor de um tablóide se envolve com a esposa do chefe e dono do jornal sensacionalista. Não satisfeito com as mudanças políticas do jornal e com a promoção de sua amante, ele decide então tomar as rédeas da situação e passa a chantagear seu chefe. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Encontro com o Destino, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Margaret dirige uma agência de arquitetos em pleno crescimento. Ela recebe subitamente duas notícias: sua prima e grande amiga Susan morreu em um acidente de carro com o marido. No testamento, Susan e Hank deixam a guarda para ela. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Arriscando a Sorte, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de viver por anos em Nova York com documentos falsos, Camilo Sanz recebe um aviso de deportação. Desesperado, ele pega dinheiro emprestado com um perigoso agiota do bairro para fazer um casamento falso com uma conhecida e evitar ser deportado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Magia ao Luar, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Stanley é um mágico inglês que tem dedicado sua vida a revelar espiritualistas fraudulentos. Ele pretende descobrir se a jovem Sophie é mesmo médium. Quanto mais tempo Stanley passa com ela, mais ele se encanta, arriscando-se a apaixonar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Porto Seguro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mulher misteriosa se muda para uma pequena cidade e recomeça sua vida. Apesar da moça estar determinada a não formar laços afetivos na nova cidade, ela não consegue cumprir esse objetivo e acaba levantando questionamentos sobre seu passado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Uma Grande Amizade, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Flora é uma elefanta circense que não consegue mais executar seus truques e vai ser sacrificada. Na noite anterior à data da eutanásia, a filha do proprietário do circo a salva. Juntas, elas enfrentam desafios para chegar à reserva animal. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Garota dos Meus Sonhos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Fletcher McBracken, um artista de rua no Texas, tem uma premonição sobre a mulher com quem está predestinado a casar. Em busca dessa mulher, ele vai parar em Los Angeles e conhece Rosalyn Willoughby. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Outra Face da Guerra, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após perder a mãe e a casa para as tropas invasoras alemãs, Artur encontra certo consolo em se juntar ao exército. No entanto, a guerra não é nada como ele imaginou. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Esau, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de anos ausente, escritor retorna à casa da família em Israel para cuidar do pai doente. Lá ele enfrenta seu irmão mais novo amargurado, que assumiu toda a responsabilidade pela padaria da família e se casou com a mulher a quem ambos amavam. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Substituto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após a morte do pai, o filho do chefão de uma tríade chinesa pede ao seu melhor amigo que se passe por ele e vire o novo líder do grupo. Mas o velho deixou inimigos que agora querem matar o novo chefão e assumir o controle. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Angélica é uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de câncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Conheça a história do órfão Wim, um menino que quer muito ir à escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com muita força de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Faça um Desejo!, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quatro crianças descobrem uma criatura mágica que concede desejos em uma viagem à praia. Elas só não imaginavam que o vizinho esquisitão da casa ao lado também está de olho nesses poderes. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica, um elfo, vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O cão vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da família Davis, que está enfrentando tempos difíceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criança, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após ser diagnosticada com câncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grávida. Além de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Perseguindo o Assassino, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Detetive chega em casa em seu aniversário de casamento e descobre que a esposa sofreu um acidente de carro. Sete meses depois, ela ainda está em coma e ele, incapaz de aceitar, se lança em uma caçada por um serial killer que tem como alvo os idosos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Página Inacabada - T01E46
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguição recomeça, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto também é um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara é engolfado por uma luz branca. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltração: O Covil Da Cobra! - T01E47
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas são parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma visão chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laços - T01E48
programme.desc: 2008. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cópias idênticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forçado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vovó Chiyo e Sakura não façam nada precipitado. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adição Indesejada - T01E35
programme.desc: 2007. Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia é salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnerável. As tentativas de seus companheiros são inúteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mãos de Deidara. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso - T01E36
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara é arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um pelotão para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira missão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Título - T01E37
programme.desc: 2007. Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como também hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara está sofrendo. Kankuro é infectado por um veneno. Sem um antídoto, ele terá poucos dias de vida. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulação - T01E38
programme.desc: 2007. Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro começa a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as táticas dos bonecos não funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas táticas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi - T01E39
programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vovó Chiyo, perita em veneno, é chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara começam o jutsu de selamento e os nove dragões fantasmas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - T01E40
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mãos firmes. Vovó Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua própria aprendiz e pela determinação de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informações sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um cão de caça ninja. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Missão Super Secreta Se Inicia - T01E41
programme.sub-title: A Missão Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: 2007. Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vovó Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a história das bestas de cauda. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - T01E42
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe começam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lança um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lágrimas De Sakura - T01E43
programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus três alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxigênio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - T01E44
programme.desc: 2008. Vovó Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi começa um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequências Da Traição - T01E45
programme.desc: 2008. Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificação. Vovó Chiyo explica a conexão entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lágrimas escorrem em seu rosto. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Página Inacabada - T01E46
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguição recomeça, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto também é um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara é engolfado por uma luz branca. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltração: O Covil Da Cobra! - T01E47
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas são parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma visão chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laços - T01E48
programme.desc: 2008. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cópias idênticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forçado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vovó Chiyo e Sakura não façam nada precipitado. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - T01E49
programme.desc: 2008. A luta entre avó e neto começa. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destruído primeiro. Só a própria avó consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas é Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratégia usarão? programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A História Do Álbum Ilustrado - T01E50
programme.desc: 2008. Chiyo e Sakura expõem Sasori, que não envelheceu nada nos últimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro - T01E51
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaça. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para forçá-lo a dar informações sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha - T01E52
programme.desc: 2008. Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnéticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacável. Sakura toma uma decisão. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Título - T01E53
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente começa a ler os padrões de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espaço, Sakura é atingida na mão e é infectada pelo veneno! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo - T02E54
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura destrói o boneco do terceiro kazekage graças a um antídoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de três minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu último trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - T02E55
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura e Vovó Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a técnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antídoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contorção - T02E56
programme.desc: 2008. Vovó Chiyo usa o último antídoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pôr fim à vida de Vovó Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura é atingida em um lugar vital, e a única coisa que pode salvá-la é um jutsu que a Vovó Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno - T02E57
programme.desc: 2008. Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vovó Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cópias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparação para a nova técnica de Kakashi está em andamento! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solidão - T02E58
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vovó Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimensão. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ... programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo - T02E59
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto perde o controle e o espírito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanência - T02E60
programme.desc: 2008. Vovó Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitação em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e também por uma multidão de ninjas da areia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - T02E61
programme.desc: 2008. Gaara e seus salvadores retornam à Aldeia de Areia. Após visitar o túmulo de Vovó Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha têm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, alguém tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe! - T02E62
programme.desc: 2008. Kakashi é hospitalizado devido à tensão causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviará a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - T02E63
programme.desc: 2008. Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontrarão de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto não deve ser enviado em missões envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade não concorda, então eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto - T02E64
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para testá-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escuridão - T02E65
programme.desc: 2008. A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direção à ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas - T02E66
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura vê Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vão em direção à ponte Tenchi, eles se mantêm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta aconteça. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67
programme.desc: 2008. Yamato faz uma simulação para avaliar as habilidades e técnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a missão simulada. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar - T02E68
programme.desc: 2008. O dia para capturar o espião finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparência de Sasori e espera que o espião apareça. Para a surpresa de todos, o espião era Kabuto. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero - T02E69
programme.desc: 2008. Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato vê a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonância - T02E70
programme.desc: 2008. Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto só consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele está cego até para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura é atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua missão secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - T02E71
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto perde a consciência e é tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrível entre Orochimaru e Naruto. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaça Se Aproxima - T02E72
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto, mesmo transformado, não desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura é ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitação da Raposa de Nove Caudas. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invasão Da Akatsuki - T02E73
programme.desc: 2008. Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitação de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto são graves. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Céu Estrelado - T02E74
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi é forçada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que está sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Oração Do Velho Monge - T02E75
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsável pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele irá suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma história estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Próximo Passo - T02E76
programme.desc: 2008. Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficará com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informações valiosas, mas ficará sob prisão domiciliar até que possa ser de confiança. Quando fica sozinho, sai e começa a procurar um livro. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata - T02E77

programme.desc: Bernie creates a public relations disaster while facing off with Matt Damon and Lucy Lawless in a charity golf tournament.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Goodbye, Dolly
programme.desc: Bernie makes a midnight run to retrieve Bryanas lost doll. Ice Cube guest stars as himself.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - I Do, I Dont
programme.desc: Steve refuses to allow Snoop Doggy Dogg and Sean Puffy Combs to use music from the Hi-Tops until they resolve their rivalry.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Cant Buy Me Love
programme.desc: A new student (Kenan Thompson) gives Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) an extravagant birthday gift, but Steve (Steve Harvey) pretends it is from him.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Whatever You Want
programme.desc: Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) new assistant (Terri J. Vaughn) falls in love with Cedric (Cedric the Entertainer); Romeo (Merlin Santana) befriends his formerly overweight neighbor (Ariyan Johnson).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Somebodys Sleepin in My Bed
programme.desc: Lovitas (Terri J. Vaughn) frequent visits stress Steve (Steve Harvey); Romeo (Merlin Santana) teaches Aisha (Ariyan Johnson) to dance.

programme.title: Love Dodoma
programme.desc: In the blue water waves of Mafia Island, Tanzania, a love story begins; Malick and Dodoma are dedicated islanders who believe true love is a gift.

programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing, and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Cindy Crawford talks about the latest breakthroughs in skincare
programme.desc: Join Cindy Crawford as she talks to real customers about the breakthrough skincare system that keeps them looking their best. Take a trip to the stunning French countryside to see the rare French melon that defies the aging process.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Another Year Older
programme.desc: Growing up is hard.

programme.desc: Yo-Yo jumps in the kitchen and gives a lesson on how to make a quick and easy shrimp gumbo.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - #Sandwiches And Sides
programme.desc: Yo-Yo puts a spin on a classic grilled cheese sandwich.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Over The Top Tacos and Burritos
programme.desc: Yo-Yo shares her love for Mexican food.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Gospel Brunch
programme.desc: A gospel brunch meal with Yo-Yo; she hangs out with her friend Big Bub and makes a breakfast casserole that is filled with everything from sausage, potatoes, mushrooms and eggs.

programme.title: And Then There Was You
programme.desc: Natalie picks up the pieces of her life after her husband leaves and falls in love with a man with secrets.

programme.title: From This Day Forward
programme.desc: Patrice (Essence Atkins) and Corrine (Vanessa Simmons), two sexy and confident women in great relationships, have to learn tough lessons about trust and fidelity to make their love last.

programme.title: Family Time - Its a Grey Area
programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.title: Family Time - The First Rule of Fight Night Is You Do Not Talk About Fight Night
programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.title: Family Time - The Will
programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - No New Friends
programme.desc: When an old friend of Tonys moves into the neighborhood, the Stallworths realize things arent exactly as they seem.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Goodbye, Dolly

programme.desc: The kids go on strike for wages after Bernie tries to make them clean up their mess, so he hires neighborhood kids as scabs.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Jordan brings home a snake named Reggie, and sister Bryanna demands a pet, too.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Bernie Mac Dance Party

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Do Not Duplicate

programme.desc: Steve takes advantage of his relationship with Regina when he arrives late and unprepared for a staff meeting.
